review: at2020 sitting on top angled down to pick up my acoustic.  would need a heavier base for use with a boom.
it works, got it on time, good price
it works, got on time.  I am happy
works well for acoustics, as well as electrics,  I have amazon prime so I got it quick. well made and folds easily
great price for good mike.  I did not want to spend a lot to start.  I got a good mike at a great price ($50)
it is ok as long as you don't bump your guitar, else boom, it hits the floor.  I don't trust it and amazon has it way over priced.  It will work if you put a nail in it to hold the holder in place.
works as advertised, good construction, folds easy, holds acoustic or electric, does not nock over easy or at all.  good product
